verses.verse: Then there was a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>; and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1245>inquired<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>. And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%>, It is for <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and for his <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, because he <S%H4191>killed<s%> the <S%H1393>Gibeonites<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H1393>Gibeonites<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1393>them<s%>; (now the Gibeonites were not of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, but of the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>; and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto <S%H7586>them<s%>: and Saul <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H5221>kill<s%> them in his <S%H7065>zeal<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.)

Why <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1393>Gibeonites<s%>, What shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> for <S%H3722>you<s%>? and with which shall I make the atonement, that you may <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>?

And the <S%H1393>Gibeonites<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3701>him<s%>, We will have no silver nor <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5973>of<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, nor of his <S%H1004>house<s%>; neither for us shall you <S%H4191>kill<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, What you shall <S%H559>say<s%>, that will I do for <S%H6213>you<s%>.

And they <S%H559>answered<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, The <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H3615>consumed<s%> <S%H1819>us<s%>, and that devised against us that we should be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> from <S%H3320>remaining<s%> in any of the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>,

Let <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> be <S%H5414>delivered<s%> unto <S%H3363>us<s%>, and we will hang them up unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, whom the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> did <S%H972>choose<s%>. And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I will give <S%H5414>them<s%>.

But the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2550>spared<s%> <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, because of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H7621>oath<s%> that was between <S%H1732>them<s%>, between David and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>.

But the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7532>Rizpah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H345>Aiah<s%>, whom she <S%H3205>bore<s%> unto <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, <S%H764>Armoni<s%> and <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%>; and the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4324>Michal<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, whom she brought <S%H3205>up<s%> for <S%H5741>Adriel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1271>Barzillai<s%> the <S%H4259>Meholathite<s%>:

And he <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H1393>Gibeonites<s%>, and they <S%H3363>hanged<s%> them in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> all <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, and were put to <S%H4191>death<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H8462>days<s%>, in the beginning of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H7105>harvest<s%>.

And <S%H7532>Rizpah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H345>Aiah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>, and <S%H5186>spread<s%> it for her upon the <S%H6697>rock<s%>, from the <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest<s%> until <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H5413>dropped<s%> upon them out of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H5414>allowed<s%> neither the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%> to <S%H5117>rest<s%> on them by <S%H3119>day<s%>, nor the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>.
And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> what <S%H7532>Rizpah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H345>Aiah<s%>, the <S%H6370>concubine<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, had <S%H6213>done<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> from the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%>–gilead, which had <S%H1589>stolen<s%> them from the <S%H7339>street<s%> of <S%H1052>Beth<s%>–shan, where the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H8511>hanged<s%> <S%H3117>them<s%>, when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H5221>slain<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> in <S%H1533>Gilboa<s%>:

And he brought <S%H5927>up<s%> from there the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>; and they <S%H622>gathered<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of them that were <S%H3363>hanged<s%>.

And the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H6912>buried<s%> they in the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> in <S%H6762>Zelah<s%>, in the <S%H6913>tomb<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>: and they <S%H6213>performed<s%> all that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%>. And <S%H310>after<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H6279>entreated<s%> for the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> did <S%H4421>war<s%> again with <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%>, and his <S%H5650>servants<s%> with <S%H3898>him<s%>, and fought against the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> grew <S%H5774>faint<s%>.

And <S%H3430>Ishbi<s%>–benob, which was of the <S%H3211>sons<s%> of the <S%H7497>giant<s%>, the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of whose <S%H7013>spear<s%> weighed <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H5178>brass<s%> in <S%H4948>weight<s%>, he being <S%H2296>girded<s%> with a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H559>sword<s%>, thought to have <S%H5221>slain<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>.

But <S%H52>Abishai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H5826>helped<s%> <S%H5221>him<s%>, and struck the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, and <S%H4191>killed<s%> <S%H582>him<s%>. Then the men of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, saying, You shall <S%H3318>go<s%> no more out with us to <S%H4421>battle<s%>, that you <S%H3518>quench<s%> not the <S%H5216>light<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And it came to pass after <S%H310>this<s%>, that there was again a <S%H4421>battle<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> at <S%H1359>Gob<s%>: then <S%H5444>Sibbechai<s%> the <S%H2843>Hushathite<s%> <S%H5221>killed<s%> <S%H5593>Saph<s%>, which was of the <S%H3211>sons<s%> of the <S%H7497>giant<s%>.

And there was again a <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H1359>Gob<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, where <S%H445>Elhanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3296>Jaare<s%>–oregim, a <S%H1022>Beth<s%>–lehemite, <S%H5221>killed<s%> the brother of <S%H1555>Goliath<s%> the <S%H1663>Gittite<s%>, the <S%H6086>staff<s%> of whose <S%H2595>spear<s%> was like a <S%H707>weaver<s%>'s <S%H4500>log<s%>.

And there was yet a <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H1661>Gath<s%>, where was a <S%H376>man<s%> of great <S%H4067>stature<s%>, that had on every <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H676>fingers<s%>, and on every <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H676>toes<s%>, <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> in <S%H4557>number<s%>; and he also was <S%H3205>born<s%> to the <S%H7497>giant<s%>.
And when he <S%H2778>defied<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8092>Shimea<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> killed <S%H5221>him<s%>.

These <S%H702>four<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to the <S%H7497>giant<s%> in <S%H1661>Gath<s%>, and <S%H5307>fell<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, and by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%>.
